Class Database

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database(int threadID, int requestHandlerID)
      This constructor assigns fields for logging and initializes client connection with correct codec to interact with the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(int threadID,
                int requestHandlerID)
        This constructor assigns fields for logging and initializes client connection with correct codec to interact with the database.
        Parameters:
        threadID - is the ServerThread ObjectID for logging purposes.
        requestHandlerID - is the RequestHandler ObjectID for logging purposes.

    • Method Detail

        public void createCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        This method creates a collection in the database with the desired name.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - is the name of the created collection.

      • retrieveCollection

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoCollection<User> retrieveCollection(java.lang.String collectionName)
        This method extracts the collection from the database.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - is the collection to be extracted.
        Returns:
        A MongoCollection object that stores User.

      • collectionExist

        public boolean collectionExist(java.lang.String collectionName)
        This method check whether a collection exists or not.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - the collection name to check.
        Returns:
        true if the collection exists, false if not.

      • getLeaderboard

        public java.lang.String getLeaderboard(java.lang.String collectionName)
        This method @return's the leaderboard from the desired collection.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - is the name of the collection.
        Returns:
        The leaderboard ranking from highest to lowest from the desired collection.

      • getDocument

        public User getDocument(java.lang.String userGUID,
                        java.lang.String collectionName)
        This methdod @return's a specific User with a guid from the desired collection.
        Parameters:
        userGUID - is the User's special id.
        collectionName - is the name of the collection.
        Returns:
        desired User object.

      • upsertDocument

        public void upsertDocument(User u,
                           java.lang.String collectionName)
        This method update-or-insert or upsert's the User to the desired collection.
        Parameters:
        u - is the desired User object to be 'upsert'ed.
        collectionName - is the collection name.

      • printLog

        public void printLog(java.lang.String msg,
                     int error)
        This method prints the desired logging messages.
        Parameters:
        msg - is the message to be logged.
        error - is the value to determine the type of the log. -1 for error, 1 for normal logs.
